name: fooddrop
description: FoodDrop - Food Collection Game with Educational Content

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:functions
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/web && npm run lint --workspace=apps/functions
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/web && npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/functions
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=apps/web && npm install --workspace=apps/functions
